subject: Public Speaking
title: Post-Speech Discussion
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Post-Speech Discussion.

hook.text: What audiences say AFTER your speech determines lasting impact.

buildup.text: Give people talking points. Make your message easy to repeat.

discovery.text: Memorable phrases become social currency that spreads your message.

twist.text: If they can't summarize you in one sentence, you lost them.

climax.text: Design your speech to be repeated in conversations afterward.

punchline.text: Make your message repeatable. That's lasting impact.

quiz.question: Why design for post-speech discussion?
options: Audiences spreading your message multiplies impact
